doc:
Paul Lukas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Lukas 0 Paul Lukas (born Pál Lukács; May 26, 1894 – August 15, 1971) was a Hungarian actor. He won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his performance in the film Watch on the Rhine (1943), reprising the role he created on the Broadway stage. Paul_Lukas ( born_Pál_Lukács ; May_26_,_1894 – August_15 , 1971 ) was a_Hungarian_actor . He won the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor for his_performance in the_film Watch on the_Rhine_(_1943_) , reprising the_role he created on the_Broadway_stage .
